Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: we have anon_crypt but it was marked deprecated recently. Probably we have to change back and consider anoncrypt as part of actual API to cover usecases for simple encryption (outside A2A flow)

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: anon_crypt was deprecated because we didn't think it would be useful outside of the context of pack/unpack. Now that we have a valid use case, we should just remove the deprecation tag.

Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: Implemented solution seems correct for current use case. In the future some functionality like file encryption may be required. Also we probably will rename anon_crypt/decrypt functions when pack/unpack will completely replace anon/auth for A2A use cases
